Title: Jewel Halter Prom Evening Dress

----

Sku: 8924

Sizes: 8, 10, 4, 6, 12, 14

Colors: coral

Category: evening

Featured-image: 8924-coral-jewel-halter-prom-evening-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: A halter top A-line gown that falls to the floor with a sweeping train. The neckline and midriff are embellished with beading and rhinestones. Lace appliques are spotted throughout the bodice. The back of the gown features a cutout with scalloped edges trimmed with beading and rhinestones.
